resources.string: Code %1$s isn\'t in our database at the moment.
For error codes greater than or equal to 100, the key below applies to text errors.
This code can be used to look up what caused a barrier not to open, and see if it\'s your fault or the barrier\'s.
When most National Rail or TfL ticket barriers don\'t open, they\'ll show a \"Seek assistance\" message with a numerical error code.
